<<<<<<< HEAD
HTML.Trusted
TYPE: bool
VERSION: 2.0.0
DEFAULT: false
--DESCRIPTION--
Indicates whether or not the user input is trusted or not. If the input is
trusted, a more expansive set of allowed tags and attributes will be used.
See also %CSS.Trusted.
--# vim: et sw=4 sts=4
=======
HTML.Trusted
TYPE: bool
VERSION: 2.0.0
DEFAULT: false
--DESCRIPTION--
Indicates whether or not the user input is trusted or not. If the input is
trusted, a more expansive set of allowed tags and attributes will be used.
See also %CSS.Trusted.
--# vim: et sw=4 sts=4
